reviews.review_msg: Richard is very passionate about his course topics, though he can be a bit biased. I found his marking to be hard considering our assignments were "reflections". Classes felt repetitive and unstructured. He is easy to listen to given his passion for the topic, but I would not recommend the class especially if you are looking for a GPA boost.

He is very passionate about the course content. Many classmates didn't like how depressing the class was. But for the few that took something away, the issues hit home - actually have changed my lifestyle. Great assignments and exams, makes you think. His teaching style and content embodies what university should be about. Great prof overall.
Nice prof! very easy going but not organized. The amount of work is fair and manageable!
Best teacher I ever had in my 4 years at SFU; knowledgeable and demonstrates a huge interest in course material; class discussions were great; will recommend him to others
